body: Problems of synchronization, concurrent execution, and their solution techniques. Design and implementation of concurrent software in a distributed system.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC121 , CMPSC201 or CMPSC202 ; MATH 220 ; MATH 230 or MATH 231)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
contentHtml: Problems of synchronization, concurrent execution, and their solution techniques. Design and implementation of concurrent software in a distributed system.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC121 , CMPSC201 or CMPSC202 ; MATH 220 ; MATH 230 or MATH 231)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
title: CMPSC 450: Concurrent Scientific Programming
